collectible.title: Hakurei Yin-Yang Orb
collectible.subtitle: The Hakurei Shrine’s Greatest Treasure
collectible.text: Not the real thing, of course, Reimu needs that to fight youkai. Rather, it’s a replica Reimu created with the intention of selling as a souvenir. Not a single one was bought, so she’s giving it to you for free. Be grateful.
